articles.description: As part of the acquisition, BBLUNT hair care and styling products business will be completely owned and managed by Honasa while the salon business will continue to operate as an independent entity.
articles.content: Honasa Consumer, parent company of Mamaearth, The Derma Co., and Aqualogica has acquired BBLUNT, a premium hair care, hair colour and styling products brand from the house of Godrej Consumer Products… [+2285 chars]

articles.title: Coal India Q3 results | Consolidated net profit jumps 48% on higher realisations - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The company's consolidated revenue from operations rose 20 percent on-year to Rs 28,433.5 crore for the reported quarter, which was also above Street's estimate of Rs 27,552 crore.
